July 15, 1899 D Pontypridd Contest (Class A)
Pontypridd Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-a
Recollections of Auber
Taff Vale Park, Pontypridd 1st prize £15 and cup valued at £52.10s. 2nd prize £10. 3rd prize £5. 4th prize £3. 9th annual South Wales and Monmouth Contest.
April 14, 2012, 1:55 p.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 7:03 p.m.
1 Abertillery Silver Henry Bentley
2 Aberdare Town Jesse Manley
3 Blaina & District Alexander Owen
4 Llanelly Town James Samuel
5 Ferndale John Gladney Jnr
